resources.string: The AlmostNexus launcher is an alternative launcher (Home) which is not supported by enomther as a part of TheOfficial. Check out the official site before installing. This operation cannot be undone except by reflashing the expansion pack.
To remove the AlmostNexus launcher, you must manually reflash the expansion pack from recovery, reboot to Android, then flash themes, etc. as desired. Reboot to recovery now?
To remove the ramhack kernel, you must manually reflash the expansion pack from recovery, reboot to Android, then flash themes, etc. as desired. Reboot to recovery now?

The "ramhack" kernel will allocate ~10 MB of RAM currently assigned to video memory to the main memory pool. This may improve performance under normal circumstances at the cost of 3D performance.
This operation cannot be undone except by reflashing the expansion pack.
Do you wish to reboot into the bootloader?
Do you wish to reboot into recovery?

This option creates a file with debugging information which will be sent to enomther to diagnose problems you may have with TheOfficial. Please, only confirm this option if enomther has requested an ep_log. This will include, among other things, a list of your applications and may reveal your email address.
You must reflash your theme or the expansion pack for settings to take effect. Reboot to recovery now?
Theme or expansion reflash is required
Flash required, select to reboot to recovery
Phone must be rebooted for settings to take effect. Reboot now?
The downloaded resource will be automatically flashed when you reboot to recovery. Reboot to recovery now?
Reboot to recovery for automatic flash is required
Automatic flash required, select to reboot to recovery
